topic.title: 동물 보호소에서 처음으로 봉사활동하기
topic.description: 동물 보호소에서 처음으로 봉사활동을 시작하며 직원과 나누는 대화입니다. 기본적인 업무 지시를 받고 질문하는 표현을 배울 수 있습니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: 안녕하세요, 오늘부터 새로 온 봉사자 김민준입니다.
안녕하세요, 민준 씨! 환영합니다. 저는 사라예요.
저쪽 선반 위에 있어요. 그리고 산책이 필요한 강아지들이 몇 마리 있어요.
물론이죠! 저기 세 마리 강아지들이 오늘 산책할 차례예요.
알겠습니다. 산책 시간은 보통 얼마나 되나요?
네, 알겠습니다. 다녀와서 또 뭘 하면 될지 여쭤볼게요.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Hello, I'm Kim Minjun, the new volunteer starting today.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Hello, | I'm Kim Minjun, | the new volunteer | starting today.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: What can I help with today?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: What can I help with | today?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: First, could you please fill up the water bowls for the dogs?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: First, | could you please fill up | the water bowls | for the dogs?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Yes, I can do that. Where are the water bowls?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Yes, | I can do that. || Where are the water bowls?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: They're on the shelf over there. Also, there are a few dogs that need to be walked.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: They're on the shelf | over there. || Also, | there are a few dogs | that need to be walked.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Is it okay if I walk the dogs?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Is it okay | if I walk the dogs?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Of course! Those three dogs over there are next for their walk today.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Of course! || Those three dogs over there | are next for their walk today.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Got it. How long are the walks usually?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Got it. || How long are the walks | usually?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: About 15 minutes per dog is enough.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: About 15 minutes | per dog | is enough.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Okay, I understand. I'll ask what to do next when I get back.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Okay, | I understand. || I'll ask what to do next | when I get back.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Thank you! If you need any help, feel free to ask.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Thank you! || If you need any help, | feel free to ask.
